about_the_game:
The after story of Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children begins from our first DLC Troubleshooter: White Lion and Black Witch and is completed at our second DLC, Troubleshooter: Crimson Crow.

In this season pass, with the arrival of a new colleague “Misty Jäger”, the story of the project “Abandoned Children” of Valhalla is to be told. From the main story, you have solved the problem of Wind Wall district, and from “White Lion and Black Witch” you have found out the greater plot underneath the messes of Wind Wall district. And with this new season pass “Troubleshooter: Crimson Crow”, you’ll see the end of the project “Abandoned Children”.

Scenario Mission

Scenario chapter 8 is to be added. the scenario chapter will consist of 8 scenario missions.

New Violent Cases

With the Spoonists gone, and the gangs taken out. Two new violent cases of beasts and enemies occur. Threatening the safety of Wind Wall district.

Higher level limit and New Equipments

From “Troubleshooter: Crimson Crow” the level limit of 55 is further increased to 60 by your scenario progress. You can also craft or obtain powerful new types of equipment for your high-leveled characters.
detailed_description:
The after story of Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children begins from our first DLC Troubleshooter: White Lion and Black Witch and is completed at our second DLC, Troubleshooter: Crimson Crow.

In this season pass, with the arrival of a new colleague “Misty Jäger”, the story of the project “Abandoned Children” of Valhalla is to be told. From the main story, you have solved the problem of Wind Wall district, and from “White Lion and Black Witch” you have found out the greater plot underneath the messes of Wind Wall district. And with this new season pass “Troubleshooter: Crimson Crow”, you’ll see the end of the project “Abandoned Children”.

Scenario Mission

Scenario chapter 8 is to be added. the scenario chapter will consist of 8 scenario missions.

New Violent Cases

With the Spoonists gone, and the gangs taken out. Two new violent cases of beasts and enemies occur. Threatening the safety of Wind Wall district.

Higher level limit and New Equipments

From “Troubleshooter: Crimson Crow” the level limit of 55 is further increased to 60 by your scenario progress. You can also craft or obtain powerful new types of equipment for your high-leveled characters.

package_groups.title: Buy TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - Crimson Crow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP 1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3220 @ 3.3 GHz, AMD FX 4300 @ 3.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650 with 1 GB VRAM or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible using the latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP 1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500, AMD RYZEN 2500X or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6G, AMD Radeon RX 580 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible using the latest drivers
